text:
Both of my kids attended Little Ones Kindergarten, and we couldnâ€™t have been happier with our experience. The school provides a wonderfully nurturing environment where children feel safe, engaged, and excited to learn. My kids absolutely loved going to school every day!

Ms. Carol, the school leader, is incredibly approachable and always just a call away. Her dedication and open communication made us feel completely supported as parents. The school also excels in providing timely reports on the childrenâ€™s progress, ensuring we stayed informed about their development.

Thank you, Little Ones Kindergarten, for creating such a positive and loving space for our little ones to grow and thrive!

All 3 of our kids went here and we cannot speak of Carol and her teachers highly enough (we didnâ€™t move out of the area because we wanted to stay in walking distance of the school!). The nurturing environment, the structure to lessons and the bilingual mandarin program is fantastic. If youâ€™re looking for a fun and caring preschool with top teachers, this is the place for your little one :)

After moving to Singapore, our two youngest attended Little Ones. It is a learn-through-play centre and our girls love going to school, making drop offs easy. All the teachers and the principal are very friendly, patient and gentle and our girls adore them ðŸ˜Š we canâ€™t recommend Little Ones enough! ðŸ˜Š

The most, wonderful Kindergarten in Singapore. Little ones is a small, caring, fun and simply outstanding place. I could happily wax lyrical about what a amazing place it is all day long. I am so glad I found it. All three of my children have been incredibly happy and flourished there beautifully.

LittleOnes is hands down the best kindergarten in Singapore. From day one, it gave us the peace of mind we needed as parents to leave our boys in such capable hands while we went to work. Not only were they well taken care of, but they also learned so much, had endless fun, felt safe, and truly belonged.
Carol, the exceptional principal, ensures every detail is meticulously handled. She kept us consistently updated on our boys' development and milestones, which meant so much to us.
Our boys treasure their memories of LittleOnes and talk about their first school experience with so much fondness and joy. I cannot recommend LittleOnes enough.
A heartfelt thank you to Carol and the amazing team of teachers for everything they did for our kids. The school is small, intimate, and incredibly personableâ€”a gem of a place that weâ€™ll forever be grateful for.
